name: Homeless Business
description:
Game Jam Project for Ludum Dare 45. Theme : Start with Nothing

Homeless Business is a game where you embody a homeless man working with a Punk Gang to clean up Chaos City. Run away from the police, they will try to stop you !!

Use your shopping cart to bring junk to the landfill and get your pay ! Hide from policemen, they will try to steal your money. Try to get as much as you can before the time runs out.

Credits :

Bouron Ludovic

Gallard Tanguy

Jacob Severin

Vincent Thibault
